bug.author: damianoporta
bug.description:
Hello, this is my ner/cfg: <denchmark-code>{ "token_vector_width":128, "nr_class":5, "pretrained_dims":0, "beam_density":0.0, "cnn_maxout_pieces":3, "beam_width":1, "hidden_width":200, "maxout_pieces":2, "hist_width":0, "extra_labels":[ "CITIZENSHIP", "CITIZENSHIP", "CITIZENSHIP", "CITIZENSHIP" ], "hist_size":0, "hidden_depth":1 } </denchmark-code>
i have created this model with this code: <denchmark-code>damiano@damiano:~$ python3 Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01) [GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. >>> import spacy >>> nlp = spacy.blank('it') >>> ner = nlp.create_pipe('ner') >>> ner.add_label('CITIZENSHIP') >>> nlp.add_pipe(ner) >>> nlp.begin_training() <thinc.neural.optimizers.Optimizer object at 0x7fcbed774cc0> >>> nlp.to_disk('/home/damiano/ner')
</denchmark-code>
as you can see i did not do anything special. Why my custom entity is repeated three times? <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Info about spaCy
Python version 3.5.2 Models Platform Linux-4.13.0-37-generic-x86_64-with-Ubuntu-16.04-xenial spaCy version 2.0.10 Location /home/damiano/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/spacy </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I'm seeing the same thing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/damianoporta>@damianoporta</denchmark-link> . Any updates?
Should now be fixed in the latest spacy-nightly. Thanks for your help reporting.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
